pr_title: Revisit MongoCollection tests for findOneAndModify operations

timeline.message: Bumped server to version that includes the fix for projections and sort. Rewrote tests for findAndModify methods based on online documentation. Fixed bug in JNI that returned a boolean as the upserted value instead of an object id

timeline.author: rorbech
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -52,6 +53,8 @@ class MongoClientTest {
         app = TestApp()
         user = app.registerUserAndLogin(TestHelper.getRandomEmail(), "123456")
         client = user.getMongoClient(SERVICE_NAME)
+
+        RealmLog.setLevel(LogLevel.DEBUG)

timeline.message: Changed partition value to be a BsonString instead BsonObjectId after latest server update. Added ignore to setEncryptionKey_shouldCrashIfKeyNotProvided due to flakiness
Fixed syncsession tests so that they take into consideration how the server is configured with respect to the partition value type
